name: Running Through The Beat
description:
Make one with the music and Run Through The Beat!

This fast paced parkour game is scattered with obstacles, some of them move with the tempo of the music. Run, slide, glide on the walls and reach the beam of the end.

The obstacles

- Blue walls stop you.
- White is the ground.
- Yellow and Orange walls can be run on.


- Purple makes you faster when you slide on them.
- Red is moving on the Beat.
